"開始5150": "/ci1 1 ...Makino, please be careful. Ah, perfect timing. Excuse me, can you assist us?"
"/ci1 1 Makino seems to be having fun. I shall thank you as well. If anything else occurs, I hope we can rely on you again."
"We failed, but Makino seems to be having fun regardless. Thank you for your cooperation."
"Ah... I apologize. I committed an error."
"Makino, are you alright? Yes, I remember our first meeting when you were incapacitated. Be assured, I will follow you no matter how many times you fall."
